snippet: William Bryan Jennings, the Morgan Stanley banker accused of stabbing a New York cab driver and making racially charged statements on his way home from the bank's charity auction in December, pleaded not guilty to assault and hate crime charges on...
abstract: William Bryan Jennings, the Morgan Stanley banker accused of stabbing a New York cab driver and making racially charged statements on his way home from the bank's charity auction in December, pleaded not guilty to assault and hate crime charges on Friday, Bloomberg News reports

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Banker Pleads Not Guilty
